item.title: Studio house, 19th July
item.description:
Drain 100% blocked with mud and debris. no rain water is being drained away

item.title: Lift out of service, 19th July
item.description:
I explained the problem last time that lift keeps breaking up everyday now.I was informed by resident(I don't work during weekend)that lift is stuck now on 6th floor.The main problem is even if the lift is fixed is working no longer than one day.Can you deal with the problem asap please, because residents are getting so frustrated?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A huge amount of litter along edge of Stockwell Close car park, 19th July
item.description:
Hi. A huge amount of litter (grade D and above) no doubt dropped by people from Stockwell Close car park is strewn through the undergrowth and greenery along the edge of the car park itself. If you walk along the pedestrian bridge from the car park and look down it is all visible, but not so visible from pavement level. Photo enclosed outlines area that needs attention. W3W as a starting point: ///broker.reef.juror https://w3w.co/broker.reef.juror Please can you send a team along to get within the undergrowth here and conduct a thorough litterpick. It would be appreciated if this could be actioned properly the first time of asking. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Close, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
